attributes.action: Do not send asylum seekers arriving in the UK to Rwanda
attributes.additional_details:
1. It evades the UK's international obligations and lacks adequate safeguards to ensure protection of vulnerable people fleeing war, conflict and persecution
2. There are concerns about Rwanda's human rights record
3. Similar schemes have proved expensive and ineffective
attributes.background: Oppose Priti Patel's deal with the Rwandan government allowing the UK to send asylum seekers arriving in the UK to Rwanda, which is a plan to effectively offshore people seeking asylum to Rwanda, treating them as human cargo to be shipped thousands of miles away - out of sight and out of mind.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614913
